attributes.additional_details: Cutting this service will leave these vulnerable people stuck in their homes with no way to travel around and maintain the independence they still have.  Please help save this route!
attributes.background: The Sunnybower Bus route is used predominantly by the elderly.  The majority of Sunnybower residents are pensioner that no longer drive, most being widdowers who visit Blackburn town daily to pass their time and meet up with friends from other areas of the town.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.  

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: 

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
